alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 11:53AM AKST until November 24 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Susitna Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures have remained below freezing from approximately Willow northward to the Talkeetna Spur Road. Untreated roads and surfaces may become icy. Elsewhere, even with air temperatures above freezing, rain can freeze when hitting cold road and sidewalk surfaces. Areas north of Talkeetna could see a mix of snow and freezing rain, with little or no snow accumulation.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
